#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define S2(x,y) scanf("%d%d",&x,&y)
#define SC(x) scanf("%c",&x)
#define SL(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define SS(x) scanf("%s",x)
#define FOR(i, s, e) for(int(i) = s; i < e; i++)
#define FORD(i, e, s) for(int(i) = e; i >= s; i-- )
#define FORSQ(i, s, e) for(int(i) = s; i*i< e; i++)
#define SA(a, s, e) for(int(i) = s; i < e; i++) scanf( "%d" , &a[i])
#define SAL(a, s, e) for(int(i) = s; i < e; i++) scanf( "%lld" , &a[i])
#define PA(a, s, e) for(int(i) = s; i < e; i++) printf( "%d" , a[i])
#define P(x) printf("%d",(x))
#define PL(x) printf("%lld",(x))
#define PS(x) printf("%s",(x))

#define SA2D(a, r, c) FOR(i,0,r) FOR(j,0,c) S(a[i][j])

#define ll long long int
#define llu unsigned long long int

#define NL printf("\n")
#define SP printf(" ")
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ppb pop_back
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define pll pair<ll,ll>

#define CLR(a) memset(a,0,sizeof(a))
#define SET(a) memset(a,1,sizeof(a))

#define MOD 1000000007
#define ARRMAX 10000005
#define MAX INT_MAX
#define MIN INT_MIN

bool cmp(double a,double b)
{
	if(a<b)
		return false;
	return true;
}
int main()
{
	int t,tc=0,n,m,i,j,x;
	double val;
	ll a[100],amt;
	S(t);
	while(t--){
		printf("Case %d:\n",++tc);
		S2(n,m);
		FOR(i,0,n){
			scanf("%lf",&val);
			a[i]=(val*100 + 1e-6);
		}
		sort(a,a+n,cmp);
		
		FOR(i,0,m){
			scanf("%lf",&val);
			amt=(val*100+ 1e-6);
			printf("Scenario %d:\n",i+1);
			FOR(j,0,n){
				x=amt/a[j];
				
				amt%=a[j];
				
				if(x>0){
					if(a[j]<100)
						printf("%.2lf %d\n",(double)a[j]/100.00,x);
					else
						printf("%lld %d\n",a[j]/100,x);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
